channel.title: What can i do to improve it
channel.description:
Please post on ways to improve my script GIVING SPECIFIC CODING EXAMPLES!!!!!!
also no1 has helped me or tuaght me the new non repeat SRL thing so mine infinite loops until some1 can teach me different
also im unsure of my gas find procedure especially the "(1,1);" doesnt that mean it will search for gas at the coridinates 1,1 which means not the whole screen?
DONT FUKN FLAME IF U DO IM GUNNA LEAVE IV HAD ENOUGH OF BEIN FLAMED
thx

ok cool thxs man 4 all the help, hope u can put in the gud word 4 me

item.source: What can i do to improve it

item.title: What can i do to improve it
item.dc:creator: @Chrisface Chrisface
item.description:
@Chrisface wrote:

Ok what your problem is that a variable called arraytype is declared somewhere and then somewhere else its trying to be declared again. Thats what Duplicate Identifier means. Also if you look in the error message it says its in Boxbreaker2.txt. This means that when it gets to boxbreaker2 and tries to declare arraytype its already been declared somewhere else hence the error.

If you look it says its line 22 which is BoxOpenerSetup; It seems pretty obvious that you don’t need this line because the boxopenersetup seems to be done automatically in one of the other srl includes. If you’re needing to setup any of your other anti-randomds then why this one?

Again this is just my best guess because i dont have srl atm and i’ve never used it but your problems definitley somewhere there and maybe somebody else who does use it should see if im right.

About your admitance to srl forums, the poll deciding whether you get let in or not will close on 06-05-2006 so you’l get a reply then im guessing.

Read full topic
item.source: What can i do to improve it

item.title: What can i do to improve it
item.dc:creator: @traitors traitors
item.description:
@traitors wrote:

thanks any ideas on why my randoms arent working?[br][size=1]Posted at: June 02, 2006, 06:48:44 pm[/size][hr]ok added more randoms but now i get this error help?

[code]program New;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include srlsrlskillMining.scar}
{.include boxbreaker2.txt}
//MADE BY TRAITORS
//++++ rep me don’t just leech please
//Since aryan down i decided to help and get back into scar
//will update it soon when i get back from boarding school
var
movecounter:integer;

const
ore1=2442345; //Ore color
moveuntil=24; //How many moves until scipt terminates

procedure setup;
begin
setupsrl;
SetupSRLMining;
BoxOpenerSetup;
end;

procedure Kscript;
begin
killscript(1);
end;

procedure gasfind;
begin
GasColors(1,1);
end;

procedure Core;
begin
SetRandomOreColor;
end;

procedure Pmine;
begin
ClickMSColorTol(ore1,1,true);
wait(3000+random(2000));

if findmscolor(x,y,ore1)then
wait(1000+(500));

if findmscolor(x,y,ore1)then
wait(1000+(500));

end;

procedure Odrop;
begin
DropTo(5,28);
end;

procedure Phead;
begin
findpick
end;

procedure Aban;
begin
RandomChat;
AntiBan;
end;

procedure Aran;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
FindMod;
if FindFight then
logout;
TalkToRand;
FindLamp(‘mining’);
FindScapeRune;
FindCerter;
SetUpDemon;
FindStrangeBox;
end;

begin
setup;
Kscript;
repeat
repeat
gasfind;
Core;
Pmine;
Phead;
Aran;
movecounter:=movecounter+1
until(movecounter=moveuntil)
writeln(‘End of script’); // You may also include further code after the loop
Odrop;
Aban;
until(false)
end.[/code]

i get error

Failed when compiling
Line 22: [Error] (12782:6): Duplicate identifier ‘arraytype’ in script C:Program FilesSCAR 2.03includesoxbreaker2.txt

item.source: What can i do to improve it

item.title: What can i do to improve it
item.dc:creator: @seifer225 seifer225
item.description:
@seifer225 wrote:

Sorry about that, mistake in my post. I used movecounter twice (should have used moveuntil)
Anyway it works now, heres the code:

[code]program New;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\Mining.scar}
//MADE BY TRAITORS
//++++ rep me don’t just leech please
//Since aryan down i decided to help and get back into scar
//will update it soon when i get back from boarding school
var
movecounter:integer;

const
ore1=2442345; //Ore color
moveuntil=20; //How many moves until scipt terminates

procedure setup;
begin
setupsrl
SetupSRLMining
end;

procedure Kscript;
begin
killscript(1);
end;

procedure gasfind;
begin
GasColors(1,1);
end;

procedure Core;
begin
SetRandomOreColor;
end;

procedure Pmine;
begin
ClickMSColorTol(ore1,1,true);
wait(1000+random(6000));
end;

procedure Odrop;
begin
DropTo(5,28);
end;

procedure Phead;
begin
findpick
end;

procedure Aban;
begin
RandomChat;
AntiBan;
end;

procedure Aran;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
end;

begin
setup;
Kscript;
repeat
gasfind;
Core;
Odrop;
Pmine;
Phead;
Aban;
Aran;
movecounter:=movecounter+1
until(movecounter=moveuntil)
writeln(‘End of script’); // You may also include further code after the loop
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: What can i do to improve it
item.dc:creator: @traitors traitors
item.description:
@traitors wrote:

program New;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\Mining.scar}
//MADE BY TRAITORS
//++++ rep me don’t just leech please
//Since aryan down i decided to help and get back into scar
//will update it soon when i get back from boarding school
Var
movecounter:integer; // Declare movecounter as an integer
Const
movecounter=20; //20 moves before the loop ends
ore1=2442345; //ore color

procedure setup;
begin
setupsrl
SetupSRLMining
end;

procedure Kscript;
begin
killscript(1);
end;

procedure gasfind;
begin
GasColors(1,1);
end;

procedure Core;
begin
SetRandomOreColor;
end;

procedure Pmine;
begin
ClickMSColorTol(ore1,1,true);
wait(1000+random(6000));
end;

procedure Odrop;
begin
DropTo(5,28);
end;

procedure Phead;
begin
findpick
end;

procedure Aban;
begin
RandomChat;
AntiBan;
end;

procedure Aran;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
end;

begin
setup;
Kscript;
repeat
gasfind;
Core;
Odrop;
Pmine;
Phead;
Aban;
Aran;
movecounter:=movecounter+1
until(movecounter=moveuntill)
end.

Failed when compiling
Line 11: [Error] (12767:1): Duplicate identifier ‘’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\SRL-powerminer.scar

thx for help but could you show me how to add these with procedures wont work by itself???

item.source: What can i do to improve it

item.title: What can i do to improve it
item.dc:creator: @seifer225 seifer225
item.description:
@seifer225 wrote:

Nice, if you want the script to repeat untill it has ran a certain amount of times simply do this:
Set “movecounter” as a variable (name it whatever you like) and “moveuntill” (again name it whatever you like) as a constant. Now somewhere in your loop put movecounter:=movecounter+1; (This will add 1 to the variable movecounter each time the script repeats)
Now instead of using “until(false)” use “until(movecounter=moveuntill)” This means that when the script has run a ceratin amount of times the loop will end
Heres the code:

[code]Var
movecounter:integer; // Declare movecounter as an integer
Const
movecounter=20; //20 moves before the loop ends

begin
movecounter:=movecounter+1
until(movecounter=moveuntill)
end.[/code]

Another way you can do this to end the loop when the script finds a certain coulor or bitmap etc.
To do this declare “killit” or whatever you want to name it as a boolean variable.
If you want the script to end when it finds a certain coulor you would write this “if (findcoulor,x,y,0,0,0,0) then killit=true”. Now instead of “until(false)” you would write “until(killit=true)” so the loop would end if it found that certain coulor.
Heres teh code:

[code]var
killit:boolean;

begin
if(FindColor(x,y,0,0,0,0,0))then killit=true;
until(killit=true);
end.[/code]

Sorry if this is a little confusing but thats generally how you end a loop in a script. Nice work on the script and thanks for contributing to the comunity

Read full topic
